gamehongo.subtitle: The best way of learning a language is actually using it.
gamehongo.description:
In GameHongo you can find games and channels suitable for your current japanese level.
The website is a list-like system in which users can rate how difficult is the language of games and videos.
gamehongo.care-experience: There was a lot of care to ensure the user experience was snap and intuitive.
gamehongo.redis: Redis was utilized for caching common searches
gamehongo.optimistic: Every edition on information utilizes optimistic updates
gamehongo.ssr: Pages have server or static rendering

amdocs.title: Fullstack Developer Amdocs
amdocs.introduction: While in Amdocs, I participate as a fullstack developer in the development of an web tool for creation telephony packages to Oi Company.
amdocs.main-task: I contributed to the improviment of the Spring Boot Java server, managed the OracleSQL database, and created new pages using HTML/jQuery.
amdocs.other-tasks: I also created a bash tool for converting GitLab commits to ClearCase. Greatly improving the velocity of building new releases.

hero-ai.title: Hero Creation AI
hero-ai.subtitle: Create your Super Hero with just one click
hero-ai.description:
In this website you can quickly create a new hero with AI generated image and backstory.
The project was utilized to polish my front-end and design skills.
hero-ai.challenges: I encountered a significant challenge related to the time-consuming nature of AI generation. To address this issue, I implemented the following measures:
hero-ai.paralalized: Parallelizing the backstory and image generation processes.
hero-ai.loading-bar: Incorporating a spinning wheel and loading bar to enhance user experience and provide real-time feedback.
